name: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? (1996)
notes: The game uses Xephyr to set a 640x480x16bit color screen mode.

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Broderbund Software/Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego v3.5/CSWrld32.exe

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Broderbund Software/Where in the World is Carmen
    Sandiego v3.5/CSWrld32.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup32/is_setup.exe
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/disc
    src: $DISC
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    arch: win32
    description: Sandboxing Wine prefix
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    letter: x
    name: set_drive_path
    path: $GAMEDIR/disc
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win95
    arch: win32
    description: Using Windows 95
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $GAMEDIR/disc/setup32/is_setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  xephyr: 16bpp
  xephyr_resolution: 640x480
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 640x480
